thread.title: HablaCuba.com Offers Cuban Expats a Special Independence Day Promotion: $5 Bonus for International Calls to Cuba
thread.title_full: HablaCuba.com Offers Cuban Expats a Special Independence Day Promotion: $5 Bonus for International Calls to Cuba

author: Ecaterina Lia
title: HablaCuba.com Offers Cuban Expats a Special Independence Day Promotion: $5 Bonus for International Calls to Cuba
text:
Tradition is what makes Cubans, as a nation, stronger! History makes Cubans proud of their past, history, and ancestors. To help them share longer stories about the past and the present on Independence Day, HablaCuba.com offers its customers a special promotion: $5 bonus on every Voice Credit order placed starting on October 10th until October 12th. The bonus applies to all Voice Credit orders of minimum $30. This means that instead of 42 minutes, the number of minutes customers usually receive for this amount, they will get 7 extra minutes! 49 minutes mean plenty of time to call another Cuban friend, or a cousin, or an aunt! The standard rate to call any mobile or landline in Cuba is 69.9¢/min , the credit bought never expires, plus the service offered by HablaCuba.com has no hidden fees or extra charges.
HablaCuba.com knows how important is for Cubans to keep in touch with everyone back home in Cuba, especially on special occasions, such as Independence Day, that’s why the mission of this promotion is to help Cubans make longer international calls to Cuba.
The Voice Credit service HablaCuba.com offers is easy to use, the calls may be placed from:
traditional phones, through the access number available using smartphones, which makes things even easier due to the free KeepCalling app. from the computer, using the web call.
Beside Voice Credit, HablaCuba.com also offers mobile recharges, a service through which customers can recharge any Cubacel mobile. The process is fast and secure and the credit reaches its destination instantly.
HablaCuba.com is available both in English, Spanish, French and Italian, so customers can navigate using the language that is more familiar to them. Within the same purpose of finding easily the information needed, the website also offers 24/7 Customer Support, that may be contacted by email or phone.
About HablaCuba.com
HablaCuba.com is an interactive website designed by KeepCalling, a global telecommunications company registered in 2002 in USA. Presently, KeepCalling provides its services to hundreds of thousands of consumers and businesses, with a focus on customer satisfaction. KeepCalling has been listed by Inc 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in the USA for 5 consecutive years. In 2015 the company registered a revenue increase of over 200% from 2011 to 2014
